item.title: CVPR 2022 Robust Models towards Openworld Classification Competition Writeup
item.author: Qi Qin
item.description: Art of Robustness Workshop on CVPR 2022 and SenseTime jointly organized a Robust AI Competition. This competition focuses on classification task defense and open set defense against adversarial attacks. Our team hit the top1 in the qualifying round and top 5 in the final round of the competition.
